# Preface

A repository to house data and code for a 3-day project as part of Hackseq Hackathon at UBC.
As a team, we cleaned, analyzed, and communicated the results of our explorations through development of an interactive dashboard and blog to present our methodologies and code snippets.


Prerequisites include: 

- [Install R](https://cran.r-project.org/)   
- [Install R Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org/install/)   
- [Install RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download)
- [Git](https://git-scm.com/) and [Github](https://github.com/)
- The full documentation for this project was done using [bookdown](https://bookdown.org)
